short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to follow Instagram suggested follower.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Instagram Suggested Follower Assistant" is a Google Chrome extension that simplifies and streamlines the process of finding and following suggested users on Instagram. This user-friendly extension allows you to explore the platform's recommended profiles and effortlessly expand your network.

Key Features:
1. Automatically retrieves and displays suggested Instagram profiles based on your interests and interactions
2. Follow multiple suggested users with a single click, saving you time and effort
